body:
Comment 7 by **nathan.beckmann**: 
As you said, it was mostly my misunderstanding, but if it was possible say:

"variable declared by not used (written but not read)"

It would have pointed me in the right direction -- I was left staring at the screen
trying to figure out how "c = b" isn't a use of c. This message would at least tell me
the compiler was reading the same program I was looking at.
